OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income, Other, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.label: Other Interest and Dividend Income
OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.description: Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.label: Other Real Estate and Foreclosed Assets
OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.label: Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-receive, certain deposits received for securities loaned, open transactions, and floor-brokerage payables.

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvesting.label: Payments for Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvesting.description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.label: Payments for Origination and Purchases of Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForParticipationLiabilities.label: Payments for Participation Liabilities
PaymentsForParticipationLiabilities.description: Cash payments related to participation costs.

PaymentsForProceedsFromMortgageServicing.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Mortgage Servicing Rights
PaymentsForProceedsFromMortgageServicing.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with acquisition or sale of mortgage servicing rights which is the net carrying value of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Other Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash outflow to reacquire equity classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Preferred Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.description: The cash outflow for reacquisition of callable preferred stock.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Held-for-sale Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageServicingRights.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR)
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageServicingRights.description: The cash outflow to obtain servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PaymentsToPurchaseLoansHeldForSale.label: Payments to Purchase Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsToPurchaseLoansHeldForSale.description: The aggregate cash outflow used to purchase all loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Payments to Purchase Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans that are secured with real estate mortgage and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedOtherF.label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Other
PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedOtherF.description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedOtherAsse.label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Other Assets Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedOtherAsse.description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge them.

PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Loans Receivable Pledged as Collateral
PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.description: The sum of the carrying amounts, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and for which the transferees are not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Repurchase Agreements
PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for repurchase agreements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaidInsurance.label: Prepaid Insurance
PrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidTaxes.label: Prepaid Taxes
PrepaidTaxes.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansHeldFor.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Held-for-sale or Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansHeldFor.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManaged.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Managed and Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManaged.description: This is the sum of principal amount outstanding for both securitized and unsecuritized loans of all types.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterest.label: Proceeds from Collection of Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterest.description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentFinancin.label: Proceeds from Derivative Instrument, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentFinancin.description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Senior Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer).

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.label: Proceeds from Loan Originations
ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.description: Cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.label: Proceeds from (Payments to) Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromPrincipalRepaymentsOnLoansAn.label: Proceeds from Principal Repayments on Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromPrincipalRepaymentsOnLoansAn.description: The cash inflow from repayments of the balance excluding interest (principal) on loans receivable and leases held for investment purposes.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansHeld.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansHeld.description: The cash inflow from sale proceeds and collection of repayments from borrowers on loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Intangible Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.description: The cash inflow from disposal of asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageBackedSecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageBackedSecuriti.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageServicingRight.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR)
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageServicingRight.description: The cash inflow from the sale of servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProductWarrantyExpense.label: Product Warranty Expense
ProductWarrantyExpense.description: The expense charged against earnings for the period pertaining to standard and extended warranties on the entity's goods and services granted to customers.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.label: Quantifying Misstatement in Current Year Financial Statements, Amount
QuantifyingMisstatementInCurrentYearFina.description: Amount of each individual error being corrected in the correcting adjustment.

RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowance.label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance
RealEstateOwnedValuationAllowance.description: For each period for which an income statement is required, disclosure of the changes in the allowance, including balances at end of period.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReceivablesFromBrokersDealersAndClearing.label: Receivables from Brokers-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
ReceivablesFromBrokersDealersAndClearing.description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-deliver, certain deposits for securities borrowed, open transactions, good faith and margin deposits, commissions and floor brokerage receivables.

RedemptionPremium.label: Redemption Premium
RedemptionPremium.description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.label: Repayments of Senior Debt
RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.label: Repurchase Agreements, Interest Expense Amount
RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.description: This is the amount of interest expense incurred during the reporting period as a result of repurchase agreements.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.label: Secured Debt, Repurchase Agreements
SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities sold under agreements to repurchase where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets, accounting for them as secured debt.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedGross.label: Securities Loaned, Gross
SecuritiesLoanedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Gross
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

SeniorNotes.label: Senior Notes
SeniorNotes.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Expected Credit Losses
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the expected credit losses, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Prepayment Speed
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Expected Credit Losses
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the expected credit, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Prepayment Speed
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

ServicingAsset.label: Servicing Asset
ServicingAsset.description: Aggregate amount of servicing assets that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing assets that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Additions
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.description: The value of new servicing assets, subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through purchases or from transfers of financial assets.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Amount
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesInF.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Other Changes in Fair Value
ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesInF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesTha.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Other Changes that Affect Balance
ServicingAssetAtFairValueOtherChangesTha.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAt.label: Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities at Fair Value, Assumptions Used to Estimate Fair Value, Discount Rate
ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAt.description: Discount rate used to estimate the fair value of servicing assets and servicing liabilities.

ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAt.label: Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities at Fair Value, Assumptions Used to Estimate Fair Value, Expected Credit Losses
ServicingAssetsAndServicingLiabilitiesAt.description: Percentage of contractually collectible principal associated with a financial asset expected not to be collected due to default by the borrower.

ServicingFeesNet.label: Bank Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ServicingFeesNet.description: Amount of revenue from servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others. Includes premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees.

ServicingLiability.label: Servicing Liability
ServicingLiability.description: Aggregate amount of servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Share Value, Amount
SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.description: Amount that would be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the holder of the share has the right to redeem the shares.

SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Number of Shares Indexed
SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.description: For a forward contract or an option indexed to the issuer's equity shares, the number of issuer's shares to which the contract is indexed.

SponsorFees.label: Sponsor Fees
SponsorFees.description: Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityOther.label: Stockholders' Equity, Other
StockholdersEquityOther.description: This element represents movements included in the statement of changes in stockholders' equity which are not separately disclosed or provided for elsewhere in the taxonomy.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreferencePerS.label: Temporary Equity, Liquidation Preference Per Share
TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreferencePerS.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.label: Warehouse Agreement Borrowings
WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the outstanding short-term borrowings under a revolving line of credit used by mortgage bankers to finance the origination or purchase of loans.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

EquityMethodInvestmentsFairValueDisclosu.label: Equity Method Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
EquityMethodInvestmentsFairValueDisclosu.description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the equity method.

ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Secured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Business Combination
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

CashDivestedFromDeconsolidation.label: Cash Divested from Deconsolidation
CashDivestedFromDeconsolidation.description: Reduction in cash due to no longer including the former subsidiary's cash in the consolidated entity's cash.

DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.label: Derivative Asset, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash, Offset
DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative assets.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Increase
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Joint Venture
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.description: The cash inflow from the sale of an investment interest in a joint venture that the reporting entity has not previously accounted for using consolidation or the equity method of accounting.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Marketable Securities
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities, including, but not limited to, held-to-maturity, trading and available-for-sale expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Allowance for Credit Loss at Acquisition Date
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Par Value
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount at par value of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Purchase Price
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount at purchase price of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Discount (Premium)
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.
